Package com.b2international.snowowl.core.events.metrics

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Metric<T>
    Measures a single value during the execution of a Request.
    Metrics  
    MetricsProvider  
    Timer  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultMetrics  
    DefaultMetricsProvider
    Class capable of decorating request's in MeteredRequest which offers Metrics for the entire execution of the request.
    MeteredRequest<R>  
    MetricsConfiguration  
    MetricsThreadLocal
    ThreadLocal based registry for request scoped Metrics instances.
    StopwatchTimer
